name: Steal Before Die!
description:
In the world of Fairy Kingdom, there are plenties of cities that are ruled by KING GORN, the worst king that fairies have known. The King is richer while the citizens are poorer and become thieves for survive. 

A player will play as a thief to find the holy gems of the kingdom and exchanges in black market for money and food. The player will go in to the forest around the city, finds those gems, and bewares the king’s guards as well.

You can play in Firefox by clicking Index.html in WEBGL Folder 

or

 You can play in MACOS folder if you use MAC. 

How to Play:

Move by WASD

Fly by space bar

Save friends by go to the cage

This project is a study project by COURSERA.
